title.rendered: Pretoria vs Joburg, South Africa T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Pretoria: Philip Salt (wk), Will Jacks, Rilee Rossouw, Theunis de Bruyn, James Neesham, Shane Dadswell, Wayne Parnell (c), Migael Pretorius, Eathan Bosch, Adil Rashid, Anrich Nortje

Joburg: Faf du Plessis (c), Reeza Hendricks, Leus du Plooy, Kyle Verreynne (wk), Sibonelo Makhanya, Donavon Ferreira, Romario Shepherd, Gerald Coetzee, Alzarri Joseph, Maheesh Theekshana, Aaron Phangiso    

Pitch Report

Venue: SuperSport Park, Centurion

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 188

2nd innings average score: 198

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: A batting beauty

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

India vs New Zealand, 2nd ODI, 2023: Fantasy Tips

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Romaria Shepherd is the only player from both teams to feature in the Ultimate Team in the last 5 T20s.

Aaron Phangiso’s selection percentage will shoot up after last night’s four-wicket haul. To further entice the fantasy players, he has made it to the Ultimate Team in 3 of 4 games this edition.

In the previous contest between these franchises, Leus du Plooy (75* off 40) and Ethan Bosch (3 for 12 and 15 off 17) were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team.

Faf du Plessis’ numbers at the venue are slightly discouraging. In 21 games, he has managed 232 runs at an average of 15, with no fifties to his name.

In his last 5 T20s, Rilee Rossouw has 2 ducks and a top score of 20.

In the last 3 games at the venue, pacers took 28 of 34 wickets and the top 3 batters scored 6 fifties and a hundred.

The pitch is a batting paradise, so much so that, of the 34 wickets that fell, only 6 came in the powerplay.
